characters.name: General Zod
characters.description: Lawful Evil, possibly Lawful Neutral. Potential to be good, but not in main continuity.
characters.shortbio: The last leader of the Kryptonian Warrior Guild and the last General of the Kryptonian army. He existed to protect Krypton and lives with the guilt of failing.

characters.name: Superman
characters.shortbio: The last son of Krypton, born shortly before the planet's demise and sent away to save him.He was raised on Earth by the Kents.

characters.name: Batman
characters.description: Chaotic Good or Lawful Good, depends on his mood.
characters.shortbio: An orphan of crime, billionare Bruce Wayne is determined to save Gotham by striking fear into the hearts of criminals

characters.name: Deathstroke
characters.description: Find your new feline friend at this event.

characters.description: Find your new feline friend at this event.
